duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement retail strategies to drive sales and achieve business objectives.
Lead and manage a team of retail staff, fostering a positive and productive work environment.
Analyze store performance and KPIs to make informed operational and financial decisions.
Maintain and optimize the store's online and in-store presence to enhance customer experience.
Coordinate and oversee store events, promotions, and outreach activities to drive brand visibility and customer engagement.
Monitor and report on the effectiveness of retail operations, making data-driven improvements to optimize store performance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Retail Management, or related field
